line_1: Yet faithful to the beaten track
line_2: The slow-pac'd sluggard hunts the pack.

line_1: Confine the million in the beaten track,
line_2: While servile trick and imitative knack

line_1: Both opposite, betwixt them keep the Track;
line_2: Avoid the Altar, and the hissing Snake,

line_1: Steers to the frozen pole his wonted track,
line_2: And bears the iron tempest on his back.

line_1: Seek round her snowy neck their lucid track,
line_2: Pearl her white shoulders, gem her ivory back,

line_1: Seek through unfathom'd snows their devious track,
line_2: Heave the vast spars, the ribbed granites crack,

line_1: And lucid undulations mark his track;
line_2: Far shine the scales, that gild his sinuous back,

line_1: The road he came, but cou'd not find the track;
line_2: Missing his train, he strove to measure back

line_1: Alone I jog, and keep the beaten track,
line_2: Pegasus turn'd into a common hack,

line_1: May boldly deviate from the common Track.
